alert.note: Alert for Independence; Jackson; Lawrence; Randolph (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 21 at 6:30PM CDT until May 21 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Independence County in north central Arkansas... Eastern Randolph County in eastern Arkansas... Northeastern Jackson County in eastern Arkansas... Lawrence County in eastern Arkansas... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 629 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles north of Maynard to near Beech Grove to Egypt, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pocahontas... Walnut Ridge... Hoxie... Lake Charles State Park... Reyno... College City... Portia... Maynard... Biggers... Lynn... O`Kean... Alicia... Minturn... Attica... Sedgwick... Strangers Home... Whiskerville... Giles Spur... Middlebrook... Ingram... This includes US Highway 67 between mile markers 109 and 121. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
